import axios from "axios"; import React, { useState } from "react"; import useInput from "../hooks/useInput"; const Navbar = () => { const navbarSearch = useInput(); const [result, setResutl] = useState([]); const handleSubmit=(e)=> { e.preventDefault(); const searchFromUser = navbarSearch.value; //example: Jack Reacher -> jack+reacher const searchFormatted = searchFromUser.replace(/\s+/g, '+').toLowerCase(); axios .get(`http://localhost:3001/api/search/${searchFormatted}`) .then(res => res.data) .then(searched => { setResutl(result.results) }) } return (
